item.description:
Can you come from a place of love with your food? Or perhaps you feel you love food too much! Learn about conscious eating from June House, www.jjhouse.org. (check out the testimonies on the About Me page!) Even if you are not constantly trying to lose or maintain your ideal weight, come to learn more about having a good relationship with your food, including a chewing meditation!

At the meetup, you will learn 5 key steps to effectively and easily lose weight without dieting. What is your metabolic rate? Are you a fast or slow burner of your food intake? Come and learn how to utilize your food more efficiently, reduce stress and learn your metabolic rate.

Keys points in this experience:

Why diets work and do not work
Know Your Metabolic Rate
Exercise
Water
Chewing Meditation

So be ready for a good time, good food, and good conversation. Bring enough to feed at least four people and we start at 6 PM! See you soon.

Also, people who are not on the meetup list attend, so do not be discouraged by the numbers of RSVP's!

dance in the light!

Susan
item.name: Love, Nutrition, Maintaining and Losing Weight
